item.title: The Chinnery was rejuvenated at the Mandarin Oriental in Hong Kong
item.description:
Source: Mandarin Oriental, Hong Kong. The Chinnery. The renowned Chinnery, located within Hong Kong’s Mandarin Oriental, has reopened its doors following a stylish interior update. Originally a private gentlemen’s club, The Chinnery has been a beloved destination since 1963. Its classic British colonial design, featuring rich mahogany, plush carpets, and luxurious leather, continues to offer a peaceful escape amidst the bustling city. The overall ambiance is a perfect blend of history and enduring elegance...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-chinnery-was-rejuvenated-at-the-mandarin-oriental-in-hong-kong/

item.title: Indulge in Glamour at the Bund
item.description:
The renowned ‘M’ Restaurant Group, led by Shanghai’s celebrated entrepreneur Michelle Garnaut, has unveiled Glam, a chic new dining lounge and bar in Shanghai. Situated at 5 on the Bund, the location previously housed the iconic M on the Bund restaurant. Michelle Garnaut, known for establishing new dining benchmarks in Asia, began her restaurant empire with M at the Fringe in Hong Kong in 1989. She later spearheaded Shanghai’s return to sophistication with M on the Bund in 1999 and elevated the city’s nightlife with The Glamour Bar in 2006...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/indulge-in-glamour-at-the-bund/
